conversation.content:
Imagine you are a router where you are given a user request and your job is to route this request to one of the provided intents.  Each intent has an associated ID and you can route a request by providing the intent ID in the response.  Further, you have a side-job where you are tasked with extracting entities from the user request that exist.

If there is no intent that is matched, you should give "012345" as the ID.  And if a entity is not present in the user input, just say "not present".

You should provide your output as a YAML like this:
- <intent_id1>: 
   <slot_id1>: <slot1_value> 
   <slot_id2>: <slot2_value> 
- <intent_id2>: 
   <slot_id1>: <slot1_value> 
   <slot_id2>: <slot2_value> 

User input: So I got a new phone and really want to know how to update my profile with my new phone number

conversation.chosen:
- aeca5f9bac2c42a9:
   ebd40d8dbe6e4f62: phone number
   a62ca4e140504cfd: not present
conversation.rejected:
- aeca5f9bac2c42a9:
   contact_type: phone number
   new_value: not present
